name: Holiday Time
description:
Holiday time is a light casual game
You can get points by playing the flying needle game. You can unlock the content of the journey with the score.

Finally ushered in a long holiday, to the long cherished island travel, heard there is a celebration.


    Game features
  • increasing difficulty level by level!
  • each level has different exquisite animation!
  • interesting play and strong interaction!
  • short plot + illustration to experience holiday time

Note: the book on the bottom left of the cover is the delete file button. Click it to clear the file and play again.
